adminLoginDescription: Shyiramo umwirondoro wawe kugira ngo ubashe kwinjira mu gice cy'ubuyobozi.
adminRegistrationDescription: Fungura konti nshya y'ubuyobozi ukoresheje kode y'ibanga.
forgotPasswordDescription: Andika email yawe, turakohereza umurongo wo gusubizaho ijambobanga ryawe.
homePagePurpose: Gucunga neza amanota y'abanyeshuri, gutanga raporo, no koroshya imiyoborere y'ishuri.
homePageFeature1Desc: Imbonerahamwe zihariye ku Bayobozi, Abarimu, n'Abanyamabanga.
homePageFeature2Desc: Kwinjiza amanota byoroshye, kubara mu buryo bwikora, n'indangamanota zisobanutse.
homePageFeature3Desc: Tanga raporo z'umusaruro ku munyeshuri, ishuri, n'isomo.
languageSettingsDescription: Hitamo ururimi rwawe rw'ibanze rwo kugaragaza muri porogaramu.
systemDefaultsDescription: Shyiraho amagenamiterere rusange y'ikigo n'amakuru y'ishuri.
passMarkDescription: Iri nota (50) rikoreshwa hose mu kureba niba umunyeshuri yatsinze cyangwa yatsinzwe.
themeDescription: Uburyo bwijimye bushobora guhindurwa ukoresheje akabuto k'izuba/ukwezi mu mutwe wa porogaramu.
notificationsDescription: Amatangazo kuri email ateganyijwe mu zindi mpinduramatwara.
advancedFeaturesDescription: Imikorere nko kohereza raporo muri PDF/Excel, kuboneza raporo birambuye, n'amatangazo (SMS/email) biteganyijwe. Kohereza muri CSV niyo nzira y'ibanze ihari.
noPermissionSystemSettings: Ntabwo wemerewe guhindura amagenamiterere ya porogaramu.
